rows.label: qst005604_msg001
rows.name:
Hey, I'd like to borrow an ancient
text about an ancient stone tablet.

rows.label: qst005604_msg003
rows.name:
Yes, I want to know about a strange
tablet that floats in the air.

rows.label: qst005604_msg004
rows.name:
There is one book that seems
to match your description.

rows.label: qst005604_msg005
rows.name:
However, no one has been
able to read it...

rows.label: qst005604_msg006
rows.name: It's okay! Leave it to me!

rows.label: qst005604_msg008
rows.name:
Hmm, it was quite difficult,
so I was only able to
decipher a part of it.

rows.label: qst005604_msg009
rows.name:
But I was able to decipher
the part that says 19A3.

rows.label: qst005604_msg010
rows.name:
There's no doubt that this is
part of the twelve-digit code.

rows.label: qst005604_msg011
rows.name:
If you made some progress,
then that's great.

rows.label: qst005604_msg012
rows.name:
You're right. The time to
fully decipher that tablet
is surely getting closer!
